trans-unit.source: Creates a quadratic Bezier curve between two points in a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建二次贝塞尔曲线中的两个点之间<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to create composite shapes using QuadraticBezierSegment objects and other segments.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>对象，若要创建使用 QuadraticBezierSegment 对象和其他段的复合形状。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The QuadraticBezierSegment class does not contain a property for the starting point of the line.
trans-unit.target: QuadraticBezierSegment 类不包含行的起始点的属性。

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the line is the end point of the previous segment, or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> if no other segments exist.
trans-unit.target: 行的起点是前一条线段，终结点或<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>如果不存在其他线段。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features Because QuadraticBezierSegment objects inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, they provide several special features: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 可冻结功能因为 QuadraticBezierSegment 对象继承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>类，它们提供几个特殊功能︰ 可以声明为在多个对象之间共享、 进行只读的以提高性能、 克隆，和设为线程安全。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features that are provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关不同功能提供的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> class with the specified control point, end point, and Boolean indicating whether to stroke this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>使用指定的控制点、 终点和布尔值，该值指示是否绘制此类<xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The control point of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此控制点<xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The end point of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此终结点<xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> is to be stroked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>要进行绘制; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>的曲线。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The control point of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此控制点<xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置结束<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.target: 此终结点<xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>。
